showerReviews.reviewText: Large truck parking lot, they got a nice dog park in the back for the trucks. Shower pressure was kind of weak. But it was clean. Great staff
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

Nice showers but staff are not cleaning them between showers. My shower room was dirty. There was a used towel on the floor behind the door. Trash in the corner. The toilet still was dirty had hair all over it from the last use. Trash in ‚Ä¶

This is my 2nd time stopping here, both times had to wait over an hour for a shower , mind you, showers are available,
Workers just walking around , showers are not being cleaned.
Avoid this place if you don't have time to be wasting!!

‚Ä¶ This place is fairly new, and I don't understand how its 2023 and truck stop chains don't understand that you need at least one flat surface in the shower to put your soap and shampoo bottles. None here at all. The soap dispenser in the ‚Ä¶
Anyone does not listen to customer, all shower vacant but no body take responsibility to clean its and we have to wait for long time although all shower was vacant

Nice fuel desk folks. Big shower rooms. Cleaning was okay, but Shower curtain was very wet from previous user. Hot water went to barely warm a few times during shower...but I must have come out clean because people have now stopped pointing ‚Ä¶

Whole place needs some TLC.  Lots of broken stuff, missing shower head, Generally untidy and a little grubby.
I hear Loves is spending $2b on refurbishments... Start with this one.

And I quote, "I cleaned that shower with love!" said to me by an employee as I was punching in my code. Right. There was trash under the sink and mold/dirt in the shower and one shower head was stuck on one spray setting while the other was ‚Ä¶

While mostly clean,  shower #1 had some shortcomings. Not sure what was splattered in the floor behind the door...kind of don't want to know.  There's water damage to the ceiling above the shower,  and a good sized hole (maybe the size of a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ crews can park there. Other pumps broken. So long fuel lines, plan on sitting 45 minutes. Takes 2 hours to get a shower and ice cold water only. Low water pressure. They don't even clean the showers. Could they at least rinse ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ the lack of staff shows in every part of the store. I had to wait nearly 2 hours just to get a shower, which is unacceptable for drivers who are on the road all day. The checkout line stretched out because they only had one or two ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ at their pumps and do not provide any quality of service.   the toilet is dirty, smeared and stinks, waiting for a shower is very long even though there are not many people in line.  simply the staff does not care to speed up the ‚Ä¶

There was a shower line of 7 drivers at 1 PM because lady who was in charge of maintaining the showers too busy chatting once with a driver, then with a co-worker. When I asked the lady when a shower was going to be available, she said that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Very little trash strewn about the lot and no overflowing receptacles. All employees were friendly and sincerely appreciative of my business. Shower was clean with ample pressure. Both of the soap dispensers were empty and el fano no worko ‚Ä¶
Always busy but shower is good clean diesel pump was not working like Always not big deal but nice people üëç ‚Ä¶
clean shower with plenty of hot and clean fixtures, laundry 2 washers 4 dryers both washers working

‚Ä¶ I came to shut down and get a shower , was told there was no hot water. I asked could I still get the shower room because I at least just wanted to get my skin care routine done. The lady manager had no issues with it. Still offered me ‚Ä¶

This was the absolute worst pilot that I've stayed at because it took 50 minutes to get a shower! 45 minutes in I realized five showers were empty and dirty! The guy that was supposed to be cleaning them was in the back playing on his cell ‚Ä¶

It's a shame that I had to watch an employee cry and walk out of work today because she was over worked! As a trucker we look forward to just taking a shower. But there was a long wait because there were literally 3 ppl working today!?!! Th ‚Ä¶

Read the reviews for this place,  we got here at 8:30  and didn't get a shower till almost 12 am. And then had the nerve to have an attitude,  like huh?? You only cleaning showers and that's rocket science at this point.

locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We were not offered any sort of comp, which can be expected in food or shower points at other locations in similar situations. We did not ask.

‚Ä¶ because I only had a couple hours left on my 14 hour clock. I decided to take a shower, and the showers are spectacular, fantastic, fresh and very clean. The TA  truck stop here in Denmark Tennessee their showers are the cleanest I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and seems like all t a ‚Ä¶. Stoped in to get a shower had one guy running the place had to shut down showers cause he did not have any help no one to clean them so u know bathrooms were bad to ‚Ä¶. Bo bought these spots out and there not ‚Ä¶

Absolute chaos in the toilets, the shower does not work, but they take money for using it. Early in the morning no one was in line, but nevertheless all the cabins and showers are occupied. I think the worker does not want to do his job - ‚Ä¶
Mann this for the truckers DO NOT STOP HERE FOR A SHOWER super filthy showers
I stopped here to take a shower and I was appalled to see the towels that they are putting in the shower stalls for Truck drivers to use. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on the counter which are sitting on the dirt a mess. I try to book a shower kiosk is not working on the top lot of people on the counter and there is one cashier. You asked questions no answers. Fuel pump is not working causing trouble ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , pump shut down without any indication it's down, go to first pump get 136 gallons pull around and park go inside for a shower, kiosk won't pull up my info, lady behind the counter offers to get my shower set up then proceeds to tell me I ‚Ä¶

Bad customer service by porters waited 45 minutes to get a shower and had to listen to them complain about being disrespected. I haven‚Äôt ever seen these people before. And complained about not having a break the girl was on break while I ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a shower. Individual shower room included private bathroom. Price includes towels, liquid body wash, hair dryer. Very clean. Nice hot shower. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ ago this place is a dump 1- no restaurant you can get old chicken and stuff to what looks like a Chester's chicken 2- showers are not the best it's so hot up were the showers are that you need to take a shower after taken a shower. So ‚Ä¶

Upon entering, the first thing you smell is mold. Not going to go into a place for a shower  ( $15 )  that smells like that. And how could you eat there ? No way...too many choices.

Decent price for gas and GO !!
Watch Out for the Big Ahhh Potholes in this muddy Ahhh lot. I wouldn't shower or eat here, store dirty. 2 stars for fuel price in area

the worst truck stop ever no body stop here , if u are team and stop here for fuel and want get shower will asking u to pay for one shower whatever how much u spend for fueling and its very Nasty , all pump very fast will charge u more ‚Ä¶
Don't shower here trucker friends. Just gone down to the Love's in Holladay. They ppl are friendly.

I was here this past Tuesday night and took a shower. . I forgot my shower puff. . This is Saturday night and my puff is still here in the same shower on the floor. . WOW. . These people Literally Never clean up the showers
It has a restaurant attached to it like the rest of them. Along with shower's and washer's and dryer's to. They have everything
The employee was friendly. The showers were dirty. Won't shower here but fuel and worker are good. Lots of parking late at night.
